Str-after.description: The Str::after method returns everything after the given value in a string. The entire string will be returned if the value does not exist within the string.

Str-afterLast.description: The Str::afterLast method returns everything after the last occurrence of the given value in a string. The entire string will be returned if the value does not exist within the string.

Str-ascii.description: The Str::ascii method will attempt to transliterate the string into an ASCII value.

Str-plural.description: Converts a string to its plural form

Str-limit.description: Truncates the given string at the specified length
